class.name: SceneReplicationConfig
class.brief_description: Configuration for properties to synchronize with a [MultiplayerSynchronizer].

method.name: add_property
method.description: Adds the property identified by the given [code]path[/code] to the list of the properties being synchronized, optionally passing an [code]index[/code].

method.name: get_properties
method.description: Returns a list of synchronized property [NodePath]s.

method.name: has_property
method.description: Returns whether the given [code]path[/code] is configured for synchronization.

method.name: property_get_index
method.description: Finds the index of the given [code]path[/code].

method.name: property_get_spawn
method.description: Returns whether the property identified by the given [code]path[/code] is configured to be synchronized on spawn.

method.name: property_get_sync
method.description: Returns whether the property identified by the given [code]path[/code] is configured to be synchronized on process.

method.name: property_set_spawn
method.description: Sets whether the property identified by the given [code]path[/code] is configured to be synchronized on spawn.

method.name: property_set_sync
method.description: Sets whether the property identified by the given [code]path[/code] is configured to be synchronized on process.

method.name: remove_property
method.description: Removes the property identified by the given [code]path[/code] from the configuration.
